title: Create a write stream
description: Creates a write stream to append data records to a BigQuery table. A write stream is required before you can stream data.

objective.narrative: This sample shows the initial step for streaming data into BigQuery using the Storage Write API. A developer must first create a write stream, which acts as a connection for sending data records. This is a foundational part of real-time data ingestion pipelines, such as those for logs or event data, and offers lower latency than traditional batch loading jobs.

regionTags.name: bigquerystorage_v1beta2_bigquerywrite_writestream_create
regionTags.title: Create a write stream
regionTags.description: Creates a write stream to append data records to a BigQuery table. A write stream is required before you can stream data.
